posts.post_title: FS: PrIcE ReDuCtIoN - 1899 M101-1 Sporting News Supplement - Frank Chance (HOF)
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a very presentable 1899 M101-1 Sporting News Supplement of Frank Chance.

Asking $XXX for the item.  Paypal gift/friend preferred, but I am amenable to other forms of payment.

First to PM or email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] with an "I'll take it!" will be the new owner.
